statements: SELECT * FROM communication_records;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, communication_type FROM communication_records;
SELECT communication_content FROM communication_records WHERE doctor_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM communication_records WHERE patient_id = 201 ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, patient_id FROM communication_records WHERE communication_date > '2022-01-01' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM communication_records WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT communication_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM communication_records GROUP BY communication_type
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, communication_content FROM communication_records WHERE doctor_id = 123 ORDER BY communication_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT communication_id, communication_date, communication_type, communication_content FROM communication_records WHERE communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT doctor_id, communication_type, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), communication_date)) AS avg_days_since_communication FROM communication_records GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING avg_days_since_communication > 7
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, communication_record FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_reason FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_name, communication_record FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, appointment_date FROM patient_records JOIN appointments ON patient_records.patient_id = appointments.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, communication_record FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_reason FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patient_records JOIN appointments ON patient_records.patient_id = appointments.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM patient_records LEFT JOIN appointments ON patient_records.patient_id = appointments.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords;
SELECT patient_id, communication_records FROM PatientRecords;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE status='scheduled';
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-10-01' AND appointment_date <= '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Dentistry';
SELECT patient_id, communication_records FROM PatientRecords WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT communication_text, communication_datetime FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 3;

SELECT appointment_datetime, patient_name, doctor_name FROM appointments INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_records PR INNER JOIN patients P ON PR.patient_id = P.patient_id;
SELECT PR.record_id, P.patient_name, PR.communication_text FROM patient_records PR INNER JOIN patients P ON PR.patient_id = P.patient_id WHERE PR.record_id > 5;

SELECT PR.record_id, P.patient_name, D.doctor_name, A.appointment_datetime FROM patient_records PR INNER JOIN patients P ON PR.patient_id = P.patient_id INNER JOIN appointments A ON P.patient_id = A.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors D ON A.doctor_id = D.doctor_id ORDER BY A.appointment_datetime DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT P.patient_name, D.doctor_specialty FROM patient_records PR INNER JOIN patients P ON PR.patient_id = P.patient_id INNER JOIN appointments A ON P.patient_id = A.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors D ON A.doctor_id = D.doctor_id WHERE D.doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY P.patient_name ASC;

SELECT PR.record_id, P.patient_name, PR.communication_datetime FROM patient_records PR INNER JOIN patients P ON PR.patient_id = P.patient_id WHERE PR.communication_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patient WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_phone_number FROM Patient WHERE patient_phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM Physician WHERE physician_specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY physician_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Appointment WHERE appointment_date = '2022-06-15' AND appointment_time > '10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patient WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT physician_name, physician_specialty, physician_email FROM Physician ORDER BY physician_specialty, physician_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationRecord WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_date ASC, communication_time ASC;

SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Patient JOIN Appointment ON Patient.patient_id = Appointment.patient_id WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-15' ORDER BY appointment_time ASC;
